enchantment.minecraft.channeling.desc: The Trident will summon a Lightning Bolt on impact, given this happens during rain
enchantment.minecraft.impaling.desc: Increased damage when the Trident is used to attack an Aquatic Mob or entities that are touching water
enchantment.minecraft.infinity.desc: Allows the Bow to shoot infinite normal arrows
enchantment.minecraft.thorns.desc: Getting attacked has a chance to deal damage to the enemy, given you are in a close range
